column2: "The ceremony of Symbol succession for the Es-Ars Federation, situated east of Cuent, was currently under way."
"Clad in an austere garb, the child who Harriet once happened upon withstood the gaze of numerous adults who would soon serve him."
"Upon accepting the country's traditional water of temperance into his body, he would no longer be Flo, but the Symbol of Es-Ars."
"Indeed. Whether he desired it or not, Flo's circumstances were changing."
"Beyond here is the Symbol's Room. I will take my leave now."
"Should you find yourself in need of anything, do not hesitate to call upon me."
"A different room."
"A different status."
"A different...everyone."
"Even Clarissa is different now. She won't get angry at me or anything anymore."
"Because... I'm the Symbol of this country now."
"That's been decided since I was born, so...I can't change that."
"I can't change it, but...it's too bad. I wanted play lots more."
"I knew I wouldn't get to. There were too many things I still wanted to do."
"In that case, why not just do whatever you please?"
"You have that capability. There's no need to hesitate."
"Who are...? How did you get in here?!"
"I am anywhere and everywhere. Anywhere within this world, you see."
"Symbol of Es-Ars. One who has been forcibly sacrificed for the sake of his country. You still possess a soul worthy of greater things."
"Are you unharmed, Symbol?"
"Clarissa!"
"Forgive my uncouth actions within these hallowed walls."
"Goodness, hahahaha! Such cruelty. I had to suffer the cruelty of being devoured, and now the cruelty of impalement."
"Yet it is pointless."
"Did you not hear me? I am anywhere and everywhere."
"...Are you even human?"
"Miss...! Guardian...!"
"Double Desires..."
"Revelry with the Symbol"
